translation.welcomeSubtitle: Your K-Buddy for travel in Korea
translation.onboarding1Title: Don't Just Try It, POP It!
translation.onboarding1Description: Just grab a photo of an outfit and one of yourself. CodiPOP creates a perfect virtual try-on, no fitting room required.
translation.onboarding2Title: Meet Nano Banana, Your AI Stylist
translation.onboarding2Description: Our smart AI, 'Nano Banana,' shows you wearing any outfit in seconds. It's shopping magic, right on your phone.
translation.onboarding3Description: No more shopping mistakes. Explore endless styles and buy the outfits that truly suit you with total confidence.
translation.fandomPreferencesSubtitle: Tell us your favorite artists or interests, and we'll tailor recommendations to your style.
translation.selectionLimitExceededMessage: You can select up to {{max}} tags.
translation.pleaseSelectTagsMessage: Please select at least one fandom preference to continue.
translation.personalTouchSubtitle: To enhance your travel journey, we'd love to know more about you.
translation.fillAllFieldsMessage: Please fill in all required fields to continue.
translation.signUpSuccessSubtitle: Congratulations! You're now part of the CodiPop community. Your personalized travel experiences await.
